website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for very lightweight, minimalist shin guards.
pros: Though minimalist in design, there is enough coverage for safety while also being very light
Washable mesh sleeve is breathable and ideal for hot weather
Contoured for left and right leg
Hard shell does not pop out of sleeve
cons: Runs small, so we recommend ordering a size up
Guards don’t stay in place for some wearers

customer_reviews.title: ... wanted shin guards she can slide on and off like the older kids wear
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 9 year old because she wanted shin guards she can slide on and off like the older kids wear. They fit her fine-I got her the small-she's about 60 pounds and 4 foot something. They came quickly with Prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. McCorry

customer_reviews.title: Great, But Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Hope this helps other parents. We had used Nike Mecurial for a the last 4 yrs and were very happy. We just tried the "new" G-Form guards that supposedly have the material that harden's upon impact. After a full 3 months of AYSO my son has asked to go back to Nike Mercurial, which he says are more comfortable to wear and give better protection. I do want to mention that I think the Nike sizing chart is off. My son is a small 10.5 yr old, weights about 74 pounds and is about 53" or 54". We had to return the small and we ordered a M and a L as he is in between. Thanks, D
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Great Shin Guards - Sizing info included in review
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for one of my boys, he said I should get the same kind for his younger brother, and they both recommended them to their sister. Three pair working great for three kids ages 17, 15 and 12. large says 5'7"-5'11" the small says 4'11"-5'3".
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these so far. Reports that they are very comfortable. She's 5'2" and an athletic/muscular 105 lbs. I ordered her a size medium. I don't think the sleeves would be comfortable if they were any tighter on her calf but they are snug enough to keep the guards from slipping around.
customer_reviews.author: Mikki weaver

customer_reviews.title: An improvement over the pull-on style
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore through her old shin guards and needed a new pair. Many of the girls on her team use this style so I figured we’d give them a shot. They are much easier to put on and take off than her old ones, which were the kind you have to pull on over the foot. These have a fabric tube you put on then the guard slides into the tube. They stay out and she says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: A great shinguard for any age
customer_reviews.text: We like these alot. They say they are men's but my kids use them and they work great. the sleeves are perfect for when you forget your soccer socks.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Good protection without restricting your game
customer_reviews.text: These are good shin guards that are not obtrusive and also provide good protection. I compared them with Adidas Ghosts and feel like they protect better from direct hits - I definitely felt less pressure on my shins from similar strikes. Seems to be related to the foam and pattern they use. they are also very light and generally stay put under my socks.
customer_reviews.author: Eds

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter as she lost her last pair of shin guards. Her old ones were also mercurial so we thought they were the same. These are not. Where you see the honeycomb pattern is actual holes on the inside. The sweat is able to get inside these holes. Even with weekly washing, these shin guards are starting to grow mold inside the honeycomb. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: My 10 y. o. daughter was very picky ...
customer_reviews.text: My 10 y.o. daughter was very picky about her shin guards. Either they restricted her, or they would cause her socks to fall down. Shes had these for at least 6 months now and loves them! They are light and not restrictive and socks stay in place! Only downfall, and it's not a big deal, but I have to wash the sleeve that goes overtop of the shin guards every so often! No biggie really!
customer_reviews.author: Deb girl

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable shin guard for the soccer season.
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my 13 year old daughter. She says: They are really comfortable and easy to run in. I like the color and because they are lightweight, I barely notice them when I run in them. (She used to wear large pull on type shin guards that were bulky). They protect well against kicks from other players. I would recommend them to other soccer players!
customer_reviews.author: TommyTx

customer_reviews.title: Works great, has lasted many seasons
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears these on his adult soccer team, and he's played with them for a few seasons now with no issues. The sleeve washes well in the washer and doesn't shrink in the dryer. The shin guards soak in water well and still look good - no cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Heyde

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love these little shin guards. I was originally putting the sleeve over them thinking that was needed to keep them in place, but I was in a hurry to a game one day and forgot the sleeves and the shin guards stayed in place just as well. The padding on the inside really makes these fit well and prevent them from moving around. The solid outer shell has protected my shins wonderfully so far.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: The compression sleeve works great to keep the shin guard in place while applying ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter absolutely loves this style of shin guard. It has no straps to rub and irritate. The compression sleeve works great to keep the shin guard in place while applying even pressure around the entire shin and calf.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Jones

customer_reviews.title: Like glue
customer_reviews.text: Proper shin guard, played as a goalkeeper in then once and from all the diving and sliding they didn't move much. I'm a defender btw, and they help up well, helped me focus on just defending then adjusting my shin guards all the time like with my old shin pads 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shin Guard, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’8; the large is the right size for my lower leg. Nice looking guard, decent price. 1 day to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love them, they are super light weight. I can barely notice them when I'm playing. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Malagon

customer_reviews.title: very poor protection
customer_reviews.text: Thought I could use for men's softball. Never even tried. Once I put them on and tapped a ball on them, I could feel some pain. Getting hit with a smoking one hop bullet would've been excruciating. The thin hard foam inner lining is useless. Can't vouch for other uses, but find it hard to believe these would be of ANY benefit to a soccer player. A kick there would mess you up big time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight shin guards run small
customer_reviews.text: These run small in my opinion. My small 12-year-old son required a men’s medium. However he is happy with the lightweight comfort of the shin guards. Price was reasonable for a Nike product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Bait & Swtich
customer_reviews.text: The product delivered to me was NOT what appeared in the product images. Instead of the slide-in shin guards show in the photos, these were the more old school guards one has to put on under socks, stepping through an ankle sleeve and then wrapping velcro straps around. They were YOUTH medium, which was indicated nowhere on the product page.
customer_reviews.author: emmaforeverago

customer_reviews.title: Sizing issue
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an adult medium. My daughter is 5’9 and a little more than 100 lbs so she is tall and thin but the Adult Medium was too small and did not cover her shin so we had to get an adult large instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO FREE RETURN SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: This product was bought after reading reviews. Our complaints are, hard to gage size. Also, I thought they were wider and do not fit. But the only reason I am rating this at all is because of the shipping charge to return! So beware. If they aren't what you expect there is NO FREE SHIPPING RETURNS!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia R. Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but not enough protection
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews about these running small but I figured for my intended use it would be fine. When I tried these on I was not sure what to expect since it was my 1st time wearing shin guards that did not go around the foot. These are very sturdy and I really like the sleeve, but I did not feel like it covered in enough to make me feel protected. Maybe these are intended for smaller calves or for people that do not need that much coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Very small, probably would have returned and gotten a medium had I not needed them right away. Still decent though.
customer_reviews.author: Bella U

customer_reviews.title: Great Shin Guards
customer_reviews.text: Great shin guards, you won’t need the soccer socks because these come with some that hold the guards in place if you prefer to wear athletic pants
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These shinguards are strong and protect against hard hits and cleats. Personally, they fit perfectly and are big enough to cover the shin and light enough to still be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ayden Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but there are no straps to keep them in place. They come with tight stalkings to hold their position but they don’t work
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Tietjen

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 16yr old daughter who is a very avid soccer player. She really loves them. The sleeves fit well without sliding down and are a good thickness for protection. They are actually a bit thicker than her adidas pair. She’s happy with them
customer_reviews.author: GwenMichigan

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: These fit my average sized 8 1/2 year old daughter perfectly. She loves them, says they're comfortable. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Slip down leg.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold onto my leg nearly well enough. I have pretty broad legs, and when putting them on they felt fairly tight. Whenever I’d run with them, though, they would slip towards my feet. Tried both above and below socks.
customer_reviews.author: Aladdin

customer_reviews.title: Funny angled shape the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Too small, need an accurate size chart. Funny angled shape the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: K. Zimm

customer_reviews.title: Good for young teen
customer_reviews.text: Great for youth. Fits well and is affordable. We don't use the sleaves.
customer_reviews.author: jml

customer_reviews.title: great shin guard
customer_reviews.text: no complaints on the shin guard, does the job and look and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: soccer league
customer_reviews.text: i needed this shin guard for a league i signed up for , got delivered in time and size was perfect , i been using it since then and it is light and looks good , good fit with my sport clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Islam M. Sebaa

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. Used chart to be sure about sizing from peoples comments and these are for teenagers.. quality looks great but its ridiculous how small they are. Im 5’9” and got a medium and shouldve gotten a large.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend 100%!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Shin Guard. I have been able to use these all season with no problems. I have tossed these in my bag carelessly and haven’t had any damage on them besides minor scratches. Earns 5 stars because I don’t have a reason to give any less!
customer_reviews.author: Nikyle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 9 year old soccer player!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 9 year old perfect! She’s very tall and thin, so if you are getting these for someone that’s an average size adult I would recommend a medium or large.The small is more of a youth size. We Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: lost 1 sleeve, but really didn't need it when wearing socks. It was exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFORTABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Looks exactly like the picture! So much more comfortable than the other kind that goes around your foot. Just don't leave them on longer than you need them - they will leave a pattern on your shin from the back of the shinguard.Totally great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: No fit guide
customer_reviews.text: I picked the correct fit, but not to the aid of the description. Attached is a photo for the fit scale.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: My daughter doesn’t like them because they seem flimsy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesn’t like them because they seem flimsy. Her words, she’s the soccer player. They’ll be returned. Nike needs to check their quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Cmtttjkp

customer_reviews.title: Needed a larger size
customer_reviews.text: If these are for a little kid perfect. My 14 year old daughter needed a larger size to fit properly. 5'6 115lbs we gave them to her shorter friend in soccer and they work for her. Ordered a diff model for us.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My 12-year old son loves these cleats. They seemed too small to me, but he thinks it's the right size for his legs.
customer_reviews.author: Namore

customer_reviews.title: Great light shin gaurds
customer_reviews.text: Barely notice they are on. Shin gaurd covers don't hold the shin guards in place
customer_reviews.author: Andrew  Ritenour

customer_reviews.title: As described!
customer_reviews.text: great quality perfect fit for my son fair price, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Medina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soccer shin guard
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shin guards- simple, minimal, easy to clean. Size small perfect for 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Steadman

customer_reviews.title: Light and protective
customer_reviews.text: Shin guards with sleeves stay in place and are light. They make a funny pattern from pressing on your legs but they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and durable
customer_reviews.text: These work great for Rec league soccer! They’ll slide around with the calf socks included, but I found that if I pair them with long compression socks they stay in place very well. My dogs haven’t chewed pieces off yet, so they must be pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and just the right size for me (6' 2")
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good breath ability in the sleeve
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes these shin pads a lot. They stay put on her leg. Good breath ability in the sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Son needed a certified pair of shin guards to play. Ordered these and they came as described. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cristie Cahlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super minimal shinguard that's easy to keep in a small bag.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Lite and fast
customer_reviews.text: These are pricey, but when your daughter plays her best soccer, and loves them you give 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: isa espinal

customer_reviews.title: Decent protection
customer_reviews.text: These were for my daughter, I got them after we returned a different pair. She was happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: NL80

customer_reviews.title: Great pads, but socks don't last well
customer_reviews.text: Nice shin guards. One of the compression socks that hold the pads on ripped after a few weeks which is why I gave them 4 stars. I had to buy replacement covers. The pads themselves are very good quality and absorb impacts very well.
customer_reviews.author: freemach

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the fly lites with regard to minimal skin contact, but they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like they are a bit bulky compared to my old ...
customer_reviews.text: They are not really "lite". I feel like they are a bit bulky compared to my old Adidas. I play indoor and they are ok, but not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SunsDevils

customer_reviews.title: Super Lightweight and Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: So light that it feels like they aren’t even there! These are my favorite shin guards. I used to have the same ones in another color and they literally lasted me forever until I lost them.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bias

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then I thought they would be but good for a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Splettstoesser

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shin guards! Protects me during play and are really light. I like the elastic/spandex shin guard sleeves a lot too!
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friend. He plays soccer and has had zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The XS is still hug on my 6 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: The XS is still hug on my 6 year old son. On the package it says it is meant for people 4 ft 6 inches tall. Wish the amazon post had mentioned this.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T Broderick

customer_reviews.title: Super small
customer_reviews.text: Extremely small...had to send back. Bought an adult large for a 12 year old (small) girl and these look like toddler size.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Great shin guards!
customer_reviews.text: Great shin guards. Fit my 8yr old son who's about 4'. Much easier to get these on when racing out the door trying to get to practice.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: my daughter loves these shin guards,
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves these shin guards, she plays 2 games weekly and has 2 practices weekly and they are great
customer_reviews.author: Micki Kunz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Son likes them a lot but he is constantly losing the sleeves they go in.
customer_reviews.author: bethany2601

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Came use from the box, still use them but im looking for a different kind
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Used item!
customer_reviews.text: The item is used. No where in selling description did it state used/refurbished item. They’re all scuffed up and used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent. Great design and fit, and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great shin guards for our daughter
customer_reviews.text: She is 9, average size. They fit great. She likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Chede

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fit. My son is very tall but very slim and the sleeves actually fitted him snug.
customer_reviews.author: Merissa Reyes-Crichton

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what she needed for soccer. She loves the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mary White

customer_reviews.title: Nike Shin Guards Soccer
customer_reviews.text: My going to be senior son said, “these are sick!” I believe that’s a good thing. Fast delivery, and shin guards were exactly what I thought I was ordering. I ordered a large as my son is 5’11”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Acurate order
customer_reviews.text: Received as promised! But had youth shinguards with one scuffed really bad in adult packaging! Very upset! This was a Christmas present! Donating to a soccer coach that hopefully can give to a child that needs them. Praying that a local store has a cool set in stock Saturday before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: MARY

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and the sleeves keep them in place. I’ve used them for a month and had no problems. The see through holes do capture a lot of moisture but I just give it a quick rinse no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Vences

customer_reviews.title: They are very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son loves these shin guards! They are very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter. She loves the Mercurial style of her Nike equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Kuehler

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Fast shipping. Fit perfect and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 8 years old boy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 8 years old boy! He loves soccer and he says that he doesn’t feel anything if someone kicks his shin! He’s in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty small fit - narrow. Other than that, the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and my son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought size S for my 9yrs old. It is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Marly

customer_reviews.title: Always good
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these guards...and they are both picky about this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Derek E Dobin

customer_reviews.title: Love these shingaurds
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shin guards. Smaller than I expected but still had a great performance when playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Moore

customer_reviews.title: After the second game one of the shin guards is ...
customer_reviews.text: After the second game one of the shin guards is splitting in half. I don't know if I got unlucky with a defective part, but I don't trust it to protect my shins.
customer_reviews.author: djordan

customer_reviews.title: Not As Big As You Might Expect
customer_reviews.text: Shin guards are way too small. This is my second attempt at buying them. They’re cut really small.
customer_reviews.author: James Gold

customer_reviews.title: Great, but missing a compression sleeve?!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great with this product but we are missing one of the compression sleeves, can we get one shipped to us?
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Stoffel

customer_reviews.title: One of the best products in amazon
customer_reviews.text: They are really good durable small so you can carry them to any game and have space for other things
customer_reviews.author: Carlos GB

customer_reviews.title: 8 tall and this size is a good fit, I feel comfortable while running in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5.8 tall and this size is a good fit, I feel comfortable while running in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but durable Shin guards
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Like this type of shin guard since it is easy to wash in machine. Lightweight too.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and function well
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly for me. Size 13 shoe, 6 foot 2. Take that for what it’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: 3-Wheel Khalil

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: The sock fits very well and is firm enough so that the shin guard doesn’t fall out. Very light
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W Stimpson

customer_reviews.title: Very good not great
customer_reviews.text: These are strait up the best shin gaurd for 20 dollars. With that being said there are better options for more money. But these do win the 20 dollar price range battle. But what ever you do DO NOT BUY THE NIKE J SHINGAURDS. They are terrible and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Austyn

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, easy on and off.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size small for my 13yo daughter. She’s 5’2”, 120lbs - they fit great! Easy to wash (I just toss them in the wash machine!)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Wegerer

customer_reviews.title: Always Nike
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The size works well for my legs which is sometimes hard to find. I am 6'2 with longer legs than a torso so finding a shin guard that is perfect is rare. The XL size were as close to perfect that I have had.
customer_reviews.author: RunForrest

customer_reviews.title: Way to hard on the shins!
customer_reviews.text: My feet were bruised up after these shin guards (without anyone kicking me).
customer_reviews.author: Pizza

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Looked to be open and size was switched out. I revived XL instead of L other then that they look grate
customer_reviews.author: James Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Small fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: 5'3" female. Purchased to cover mostly lower part of shin for rope climbs. Small fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: dawnt

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 and the small fit him perfect! They are easy for him to get on and off himself. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Trauth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits like a glove, I love the color and the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Real nice shin guards!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter (U9) and they are great. Real vivid color and great fit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Aquilino

customer_reviews.title: Small size is super snug on my 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: Small size is super snug on my 9 year old. He can wear them, but the product is much smaller than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: erika hudgens

product_meta.title: Nike Mercurial Lite Shin Guard
product_meta.description:
Nike Mercurial Lite Shin Guard (Light Blue)
